name: We Are One
summary: We Are One is a brain-bending VR puzzle-shooter with an unforgettable twist. Record and clone your actions, make time loops and bring the fight to the evils of industrialization. Pass weapons between clones, dodge incoming attacks and find the perfect vantage point as you lead the charge for Mother Nature. Master 50 meticulously crafted levels in the campaign and limitless new challenges with the Level Creator!
